title: Start
body: Oh! Hello, I'm Alice! Oh dear... #line:10000200

title: Decoration
body: Oh! Well, there's a special station that will let you make some of the eggs for the collection!#line:10000710
If you bring me 3 ^c:d03e37;regular chicken eggs^c:pop I'll give it to you and show you how it works!#line:10000720

title: Collection
body: There's a whole new collection for you!#line:10000610
And special prizes if you bring me decorated eggs.#line:10000620
There are some where you'll find bugs or fossils, and of course you'll find some hidden in the maze. For every % eggs you bring me I'll give you a prize!#line:10000630

title: TeaParty
body: Well it was supposed to happen soon, but I've managed to break my tea set! Can you find me another one #line:10000910

title: Maze
body: Isn't it pretty? It's a little piece of home!#line:10000810
You can find Decorated eggs and goodies in it!#line:10000820
There are all sorts of secrets! And there's a big prize if you make it to the center!#line:10000830

title: Intro
body: What's going on? Oh, lots of stuff! We're celebrating Easter!#line:10000400
There's egg collecting and egg decorating, and a maze, and there was supposed to be a tea party.#line:10000500
